about: Bright Data is the leading web data infrastructure powering AI and BI, trusted by over 20,000 companies - from top AI innovators to global leaders in eCommerce, financial services, market research, cybersecurity, travel, martech, and beyond. Our platform enables teams to seamlessly discover, access, extract, and interact with web data at unmatched scale, speed, and accuracy - including global proxy networks, automated web unlocking, advanced browsing technology, and ready-to-ingest petabyte-scale datasets.

unformatted_about:
Bright Data is the leading web data infrastructure powering AI and BI, trusted by over 20,000 companies - from top AI innovators to global leaders in eCommerce, financial services, market research, cybersecurity, travel, martech, and beyond.

Our platform enables teams to seamlessly discover, access, extract, and interact with web data at unmatched scale, speed, and accuracy - including global proxy networks, automated web unlocking, advanced browsing technology, and ready-to-ingest petabyte-scale datasets.

updates.text: Here’s a tough truth: 98% of organizations say they face challenges scaling data acquisition for AI. That’s not surprising when you consider how fast AI is evolving. From generative models to autonomous agents, the demand for diverse, real-time data is exploding. The Data for AI report highlights the biggest roadblocks—like infrastructure limitations, data quality issues, and cost—and how companies are tackling them. If you’re planning to scale your AI efforts, understanding these challenges (and how others are solving them) is a great place to start: https://lnkd.in/gkFSnRuT
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: We often talk about training data like it’s the only data that matters. But AI needs data at every stage—training, fine-tuning, inference, and even monitoring. According to the Data for AI report, 📈65% of organizations rely on public web data as their primary training source. But that’s just the beginning. Real-time data is increasingly being used to keep models up-to-date and context-aware. Think of it like this: AI isn’t a one-and-done project. It’s a living system that needs a constant flow of fresh, high-quality data to stay effective. The report is full of insights on how companies are building data strategies that evolve with their AI. Check it out: https://lnkd.in/gkFSnRuT
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: 📈 Prices are on the rise — and the data confirms it. We analyzed millions of data points and observed a clear trend: major retailers and online marketplaces are increasing prices across a wide range of consumer goods. This kind of insight is critical for businesses navigating today’s fast-moving markets. Monitoring pricing shifts in real time helps companies stay competitive and make informed decisions. With tools like our web data APIs and Bright Insights platform, organizations can efficiently track changes across multiple websites and even gain visibility into in-store pricing. Curious to see the full picture? Our latest findings were featured in The Verge. Take a look to explore how data can reveal what’s happening in the retail landscape. https://lnkd.in/ebk7X6Zf
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: Join us for an exclusive meetup with top AI professionals. Connect, collaborate, and contribute to the conversation shaping the future of data and AI. + Pizza 🍕 , beer 🍺 and other brain fuel ❤️ On the agenda: - Discover how to supercharge your AI with real-time web access - See live demos on semantic search and disinformation detection - Learn about the latest advances in ethical AI and responsible data innovation. - Network with fellow engineers, data scientists, and founders We’d love to have you there. Or Lenchner Limor Ziv (Ph.D) Daniel Ravner Yair Beer Grab your spot now: https://lnkd.in/dqdg3GAF Brinker Humane AI
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: 🛒 Bright Data’s eCommerce datasets are helping media explain how tariffs are driving up prices at retailers like Shein and Temu. Using our datasets, APIs, and custom scrapers, we tracked real-time pricing trends. This is a great example of how businesses and researchers use Bright Data to monitor market changes, stay competitive, and deliver data-driven insights. Read the Verge's story here: https://lnkd.in/gJ_hbrz5
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: Bright Data at ODSC East 2025 – Booth #17 We're excited to take part in #ODSC East 2025, from May 13–14 at the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. Stop by Booth #17 to discover how real-time web data can enhance your AI initiatives from powering #LLMs and autonomous agents to building scalable, dynamic data pipelines. Our team will be on hand throughout the event to share insights, demonstrate solutions, and show you how live data can drive smarter, more adaptive AI systems. 📌 Featured Session - “Give Your AI the Keys to the Web” 🗓 May 13 | 11:00–11:20 AM 🎙 Speaker: Ariel Shulman, Chief Product Officer, Bright Data Learn how to connect AI with the live web to enable real-time intelligence. This session will cover strategies for overcoming rate limits, parsing dynamic content, and building compliant, scalable data pipelines that extend AI capabilities beyond static training data. 💡 Live Demo on the Expo Floor “Breaking Barriers: How AI Agents Ensure Access to Live Data at Scale” 🗓 May 14 | 11:35 AM 📍 Exhibition Floor Demo Area See how AI agents can maintain uninterrupted access to any web resource powered by Bright Data’s infrastructure and Google’s new ADK. Learn how to overcome anti-bot defenses and ensure reliable, scalable data acquisition for your AI systems. Whether you're solving data access challenges or scaling AI across your organization, we're excited to connect and explore how Bright Data can support your goals. Looking forward to seeing you there. Ariel Shulman , Bill Paulsen , Kevin Mergruen , Henry Langer , Daniel Baldesarra, Uri Refael Baum , Hadar Danino Zimring 🎗️ #ODSC #ODSC2025 #BrightData #AI #WebData #LLM #DataScience #LiveData #AIAgents #BostonEvents
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: Bright Data is proud to support the #Base4Good Hackathon, hosted by Base44 , as an official partner. Participants are using real-time web data to power AI-driven applications. With Bright Data’s tools integrated into Base44’s environment, teams are building solutions for measurable social good, reflecting our commitment to ethical data use and global impact. -> About the hackathon: https://www.base4good.com -> Data4Good Use Case: https://lnkd.in/dGdw5n52 More on the The Bright Initiative by Bright Data : https://lnkd.in/dVT7fTz #DataForGood #DataForAI #SocialImpact #Hackathon #BrightData #Base44 #APIs #AI
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: It’s been over two years since the first season of Iron Analyst. It’s crazy to think how the data industry has evolved since then. Imagine how different this project would look today with data-packed LLMs and AI agents collecting web data at scale. The game has officially changed! We’re thinking about Season 2! Got any ideas? Drop them in the comments. Thanks again to our Iron Analysts who made the first season happen: Ken Jee , Shashank Kalanithi , Avery Smith , Zach Wilson , Mikiko Bazeley , Keith Galli , Tina Huang, Alex Freberg , Luke Barousse , Joshua Starmer PhD , Benjamin Rogojan , Matthew Housley , Mark Freeman , and Hunter Kempf . Here’s a link to watch the full episode: -> https://lnkd.in/e8DdWpYj Here's how Bright Data is powering LLMs and AI agents: -> https://lnkd.in/dtEF9icr #DataScience #AI #MachineLearning #ArtificialIntelligence #BigData #LLMs #AIAgents #DataAnalytics #DataVisualization #FutureOfAI
updates.title: Bright Data

updates.text: This 45-minute webinar will equip you with strategies to handle high-volume data demands in the travel industry and keep your dynamic pricing algorithms efficient. In This Live Webinar, You Will Learn How To: - Ensure continuous access for scraping operations - Develop a scalable browser infrastructure robust enough for any demand - Extract data effectively from JavaScript-rendered websites Key Takeaways: - Execute high-volume scraping requests seamlessly - Build robust infrastructures for any load - Successfully extract data from JavaScript-rendered pages Ideal for: - IT Professionals in the Travel Industry - Data Scientists and Analysts - Developers Don't Miss Out: Prepare your systems to handle the surge of data collection demands this holiday season with cutting-edge strategies and technologies. 🔗 Register Now to Reserve Your Spot! https://lnkd.in/d3a6JNKz #DataScraping #DynamicPricing #TravelIndustry #Webinar #LiveEvent #DataExtraction #JavaScript #ScalableSolutions #TechnicalSolutions #HolidaySeason

updates.text: Don’t miss Yanay Sela , CMO of Bright Data this Wednesday at #TechWeekSingapore . In his session, “Data Darwinism: Beyond the Mirage of Numbers,” you will learn: • How the top 10% of eCommerce brands are leveraging web data for predictive analytics and dynamic pricing • How to avoid the trap of vanity metrics and focus on what truly drives competitive advantage • Strategies to shape market trends and respond faster than competitors Join us on Oct 9th, 10:25 AM at Marina Bay Sands, eCommerce Center Stage! Gunja Gargeshwari Sharon Laor Yvonne L. Vincent Ong Shinara Kanwar Varna Rajan KT Prasad Hadar Danino Zimring 🎗️ #TechWeekSG #eCommerce #BrightData #DataDrivenLeadership #ECEA #eCommerceExpoAsia #TFMA #TechnologyforMarketingAsia #Singapore
